# Lashing Shadowcraft Weapon (MagWpnSpcAb)
## Overview
This *two-handed melee shadowcraft weapon* is extremely ductile, and it easily bends and stretches without hampering its ability to harm opponents. On command, a *lashing shadowcraft weapon* can be extended as a swift action, increasing the weaponâ€™s reach by 5 feet for 1 round. While extended, the wielder does not threaten adjacent creatures, or creatures up to 10 feet away if the weapon already has reach.

Moderate illusion and transmutation; CL 6th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Long Arm (Spell)|long arm]]*, *[[Major Creation (Spell)|major creation]]*, *shadow weapon*; Price 14,500 gp

**Source:** Blood of Shadows, pg. 23
